=== About QtTube ===

QtTube is a simple application that allows you to download videos from YouTube (either by writing the URL where you can view them or their ID), and convert them to .ogg or another format you want.

It is powered by Python and Qt4 and makes use of 'youtube-dl' in order to find the download URL of the videos.

<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/qttube|QtTube on Launchpad]]</nowiki> | <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/qttube/+download|Download]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/qttube/0.x/0.1/+download/QtTube-0.1.tar.gz|version 0.1]]</nowiki>)
